page_description: Manage SMS notification subscriptions for administrators.
fetch_error: Failed to load administrator records. Please try again.
validation_missing_phone_content: The administrator must have a contact number saved to subscribe to SMS notifications.
subscribe_modal_phone_prefix: An OTP will be sent to:
otp_sent_message: An OTP has been sent to the contact number. Enter the code below to confirm.
subscription_success_content: The administrator is now subscribed to SMS notifications.
subscription_fail_content: OTP verification failed. Please try again.
subscription_fail_content_generic: An unexpected error occurred during subscription.
request_otp_fail_content_generic: Could not send OTP. Check the contact number and try again.
unsubscribe_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe {{name}} from SMS notifications? They will no longer receive urgent alerts.
unsubscribe_warning_message: This action is irreversible through this form and will require re-subscription.
unsub_success_content: The administrator has been unsubscribed from SMS notifications.
admin_add_success_content: {{name}} has been added as a new admin user.
admin_add_fail_content_generic: Could not save the new admin due to a server error. Please try again.
validation_admin_fields_required: Please fill out all fields (name, email, and contact number).
